name: SuiteProfiler Color Map File
summary: Learn about .IGG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SuiteProfiler and IGG files enable users to create color map profiles for color scale alterations without editing the original image. Different color map profiles can be applied to the same image to achieve different effects, such as black and white appearances or custom color schemes for a target printing device.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
